attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: MIT researchers have developed FragFold, a new AI-driven computational method that predicts protein fragments capable of binding to or inhibiting specific targets, potentially revolutionizing biological research and therapeutic strategies.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: An emerging entertainment revolution is underway, driven by AI and other advanced technologies, which is reshaping how content is created and consumed across media platforms.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A new machine-learning model from the Whitehead Institute and CSAIL is designed to predict protein localization, offering insights that could aid in understanding diseases at a molecular level.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: China's electric vehicle industry is pivoting significantly towards humanoid robotics, showcased dramatically at a major televised event where humanoid robots performed on stage, reflecting a growing trend and investment in AI-driven robotics.
